EIA Plant Identification number. One to: The EIA fuel code associated with the fuel receipt

(fuel_quantity * average_heat_content  * fuel_cost_per_mmbtu), where: average_heat_content is mmbtu per unit of fuel_quantity, and fuel_cost_per_mmbtu is all costs incurred in the purchase and delivery of the fuel to the plant in dollars per million Btu(MMBtu)
Total heat content of all fuels consumed by the plant.
Overall heat rate for the plant in MMBTU per Mwh of net generation (fuel_consumed_mmbtu / net_generation_mwh).
Net electricity generation in Mwh for all units that are part of the plant.
Total installed capacity for all units (coal or otherwise) that are part of the plant.
